howToUse.title: How to Use Font Generator
howToUse.subtitle: Create beautiful fonts in just three simple steps

step1.label: STEP 1
step1.title: Enter Your Text
step1.description: Type or paste your text into the input box. For text-to-image fonts, you'll see a live preview as you type.

step2.label: STEP 2
step2.title: Choose Your Style
step2.description: For copy-paste fonts, browse through 180+ styles and click to copy. For text-to-image fonts, customize colors, effects, and settings.

step3.label: STEP 3
step3.title: Copy or Download
step3.description: Copy the styled text to your clipboard or download the image file. Use it anywhere - social media, documents, or designs!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about fontmeme.fun

q1.question: How does Font Generator work?
q1.answer: Just enter your text, choose between copy-and-paste or text-to-image fonts, navigate through all the available options, and copy or download the generated text!

q2.question: What is the difference between copy-and-paste fonts and text-to-image fonts?
q2.answer: Copy-and-paste fonts use Unicode symbols that are similar to Latin alphabet characters to create stylish text you can paste anywhere online. If you want a wider variety of designs, text-to-image fonts let you use any custom font for your text and download it as an image, which you can print or copy to some places (e.g. a Word document).

q3.question: When pasting copy-and-paste fonts, why do some symbols show up as boxes (‚òê)?
q3.answer: This happens when the font, device or app you are using does not support the specific Unicode characters in the text. Not all fonts include every possible character, so if a character is not available, it may be displayed as a box or question mark.

q4.question: Where can I use copy-and-paste fonts?
q4.answer: You can use copy-and-paste fonts on any platform that supports text input, including social media, messaging apps, and word processors. Just copy the styled text and paste it wherever you like!

q5.question: Are the fonts free to use?
q5.answer: Our tool is completely free. All copy-and-paste fonts can be freely used for any purpose, as they are just Unicode characters. For text-to-image fonts, please check the licensing information provided with each font.

q6.question: Can I use my own fonts?
q6.answer: Our tool currently does not support uploading custom fonts. However, you can use any of the available copy-and-paste or text-to-image fonts provided on our platform.

q7.question: How can I bold or italic text on Instagram, Discord or Facebook?
q7.answer: You can use our copy-and-paste fonts to create bold, italic, or strikethrough text instantly. Just type your text, copy the style you want, and paste it into your bio, comment, or message.

q8.question: Can I generate fonts for tattoos or logos?
q8.answer: Yes! Use our text-to-image tool to preview names or quotes in real fonts and download them as PNG or SVG. Perfect for tattoos, logos, or personal designs.
